summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net income in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Net income in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year

Net income in million U.S. dollars is rapidly increasing from 2005 to 2007, gradually decreasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2016, rapidly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly rapidly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Net income in million U.S. dollars about 1813.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Net income in million U.S. dollars about 45.0 was recorded at Year 2005
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net income in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2008 to 2012.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2005 to 2008.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
